body.name: Baby Trend Lil Snooze Deluxe III for Twins,Cozy Berry
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 44 mins
features: Includes two removable Rock-A-Bye Bassinet converts to a stand alone rocker and includes plush fabric and mesh sides for proper ventilation
Each Rock-A-Bye Bassinet includes two hanging toys to stimulate grasping and reaching
Equipped with an electronic music center with volume control, nightlight, and vibration for each Rock-A-Bye Bassinet
Music center includes two styles of music and nature sounds
Removable full-size bassinet converts to a full-size playard space and includes Flip over changing table for convenience
body.description: The Baby Trend Lil Snooze Deluxe III for Twins features two Removable Rock-A-Bye Bassinets with a canopy, plush fabric and mesh sides for proper ventilation and two hanging toys. The playard includes a removable full bassinet that allows it to convert to a full-size playard, a flip over changing table and a deluxe parent organizer to hold all of the essentials. Your twin babies will enjoy the electronic music center with volume control, nightlight, and vibration which includes two styles of music and nature sounds. A convenient travel/storage bag allows you to take the Lil Snooze Deluxe III Twins on-the-go and it can be moved from place to place with large wheels and secured with brakes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely buy it!
reviews.reviewText: We love this playpen!! We lived in our bedroom for the first three months because I honestly had everything I needed in there, including a twin bassinet (not this playpen). Now that we’ve ventured downstairs, this is PERFECT! The bassinets are so easy to pull in and out of the playpen and everything feels so sturdy. My boys are now a little too big for the bassinets so they are out but the shelf they rested on is beyond amazing for the babies to be high enough to see out and for me to reach down and take care of them without breaking my back (read: twin pregnancy WRECKED this back and the constant changing weight of my chest with milk production doesn’t help!). The Twin Z pillow sits perfectly on that shelf and this is our one stop shop for tandem bottles, nap time, and safe space while mama gets chores done. Babies fussy? The shelf does move with the slightest movement so swaying and hip checking the side will get the playpen swaying with me and the babies are instantly soothed. The diaper changing tray is also amazing but a little low for my comfort so I have a changing station on a higher counter to help my back. There are wheels on one side of the playpen so we wheel it room to room if needed (without the babies inside). I highly recommend!! Pictured: happy babies snuggled in blankies with avid mama supervision!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multi use twin holder
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. Very easy to install. I havent really used the changing station just because I prefer changing ththe babies on a bed. The 2 individual bassinet rockers are super cool to me. They attach to the play pen, you can detach them and use them anywhere, and when i dont need it i can take it apart and store it under the playpen or bed. It also comes with 2 little music boxes, with 3 options of different sounds, volume options, and nightlight. Big fan of the nursery center, I use it the most. Theres also a holder for diapers and other things which I find super useful to keep everything in one place. This product is a dream for anyone expecting twins with the best pricing. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better that what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Playard is fully equipped. Everything came in 1 box, fast delivery. However, instructions for assembly were not clear, I had to go on youtube and watch an assembly video.I will update once my twins have arrived and it's been used.Update Aug 9 2022My babies were preemies and required adjustments on their sleeping and nap settings so we couldn't use the bassinets that came with the playard.They started taking naps in the playard when they're 3months old which was perfect fit for them (both)Fast forward, being 6 months old they're rolling over all the time so we can't use the changing table anymore (feels kinda unstable even when strapped to the playard) and in general the playard size works for 1 baby at a time, not both inside.I had to arrange a napping and playing area in the living room, so I'll be using the playard for storage or travelling.I don't regret buying this product I just wish the playard was a bit larger to really fit both babies inside (napping, playtime, etc).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just as the picture shows. Very bright colors and very strong made, steady and support is good, very safe, the locks on the wheels are strong even in a floor that things can be slide easily it would hold grip. Beautiful two sheep's for each bed they are the cutest thing. Very adorable. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My niece love them
reviews.reviewText: My niece was very happy with the product and Appearance was easy to assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for twins!
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely a must have for twins! So for it has worked great for us for the last 2 months with our twins. I keep it right by my bed and the bassinets work perfect. Super easy to put together and quick to close up if you want to move it from room to room. Bassinets pop out easily so you can carry the babies to different rooms for naps if needed, something we did when they were brand new :)The reason for 4 stars is the inside mat on the bassinets does not remove to wash. It has gotten quite dirty from spit up over the last few months and there is no way to take it out and wash it. I read another review that said theirs veclcros in? That is not that case with mine. Other than that this has worked out perfect for our needs so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a shower gift for twins..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I purchased this earlier
reviews.reviewText: Love this for my twin grandbabies. I don't know how long they will be in the cradles parts. They are just over two months old now getting long. So they will grow out soon. The pac n play is great. They can still sleep on the top part for a while and then expand to stand in the bottom later. The changing table is nice and all parts secure. You just have to remove one of the cradle beds is you want the changing table on top. Everything is convenient at hands length. Great for when they come to stay I don't have to have a lot of baby furniture. That's for their home. The price was not bad. And it all can break down and go into a carrier bag. When grandchildren grow up I'll pass on to someone else. Little wear and tear when taken care of.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bastante parecido a lo que sugieren en la compra, solo el show de armarlo por primera vez

reviews.reviewText: Práctico y cómodo sobre todo el poder desmontar los cuneros para poder mover a los niños aunque en época de frío se mete mucho por los lados se puede solucionar fácilmente con una cobija o sabana también es cómodo utilizar el cambiador y el corral es de buen tamaño aunque falta un colchón desente para el mismo, fácil de mover y no muy pesado a pesar del tamaño que aparenta y los materiales se ven sólidos
Súper práctica, a ver que tal funciona con mis mellizos.
